channel.title: Compile prob
channel.description:
i get this when i compile trying to make me a custom yell
[code]client.java:9976: ')' expected if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && (playerName.eq ualsIgnoreCase("Mod Death")) {
^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
the full code is
[code] if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Mod Death")) {
yell("[@ran@Owner@ran@]"+playerName+": " + command.substring(5)); }[/code]
please help?

item.title: Compile prob

item.description:
@Music8 wrote:

i get this when i compile trying to make me a custom yell

[code]client.java:9976: ‘)’ expected
if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && (playerName.eq
ualsIgnoreCase(“Mod Death”)) {

                        ^

1 error
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

the full code is

[code] if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Mod Death”)) {

			yell("[@ran@Owner@ran@]"+playerName+":  " + command.substring(5));
	}[/code]

please help?
